data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Insigniocastnia J. Y. Miller, 2007 (Lepidoptera: Castniidae) with notes on Castnia amalthaea H. Druce, 1890

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Worthy, Robert, González, Jorge M., Ríos, Sergio D. (2019): A review of the genus Insigniocastnia J. Y. Miller, 2007 (Lepidoptera: Castniidae) with notes on Castnia amalthaea H. Druce, 1890. Zootaxa 4550 (2): 277-288, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4550.2.8
